metadata.name: MUTED?  | PNK#01
metadata.description:
MUTED?
(3100 x 3100 pixels, phygital artwork, 2022)
[PINK]

One edition of 10


The artwork tackles the theme of communication and its relationship to self-expression. It showcases the struggle between conformity and expressing your true being. The goal of this collection is to inspire. It should encourage you to ask questions by learning about your own communication. 

“Muted?” is a phygital NFT. You purchase the NFT and receive a physical bag uniquely designed in reference to the artwork. 

Linking a bag to the NFT is the first of many steps to enrich its value and sustainability. Therefore, HOMME DU MONDE will evaluate and deploy the possibilities given by Web 3.0. Connecting “Muted?” to the owner’s involvement in artistic projects is already in consideration.

REDEMPTION PROCESS:  
For further instructions on redeeming your physical bag, please contact us directly after your purchase. Our email address is: sales@hdm-store.com
